description: Structured information on a protocol execution.
label: Protocol execution
name: ProtocolExecution

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/behav._instruction: Add all behavioral tasks that were performed during this protocol execution.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/behav.description: Specific set of defined activities (or their absence) that should be performed (or avoided) by a subject.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/behav.label: Behavioral task
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/behav.name: behavioralTask

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr._instruction: Enter a description of this activity.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.description: Longer statement or account giving the characteristics of someone or something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.label: Description
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/descr.name: description

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ended._instruction: Enter the time (e.g., '20:20:39+00:00') or datetime (e.g., '2018-11-13T20:20:39+00:00') of when the activity ended.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ended.label: Ended at time
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/ended.name: endedAtTime

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/input._instruction: Add all inputs used by this activity.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/input.description: Something or someone that is put into or participates in a process or machine.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/input.label: Input
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/input.name: input

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isPar._instruction: Add the dataset version in which this protocol execution was conducted.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isPar.description: Reference to the ensemble of multiple things or beings.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isPar.label: Is part of
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/isPar.name: isPartOf

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/looku._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this activity that may help you to more easily find it again.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/looku.label: Lookup label
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/looku.name: lookupLabel

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/outpu._instruction: Add all outputs generated by this activity.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/outpu.description: Something or someone that comes out of, is delivered or produced by a process or machine.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/outpu.label: Output
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/outpu.name: output

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/param._instruction: Add all important parameters grouped in context-specific sets that were used in this activity.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/param.description: Manner, position, or direction in which digital or physical properties are set to determine a particular function, characteristics or behavior of something.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/param.label: Parameter set
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/param.name: parameterSet

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/prepa._instruction: Add the initial preparation type for this protocol execution.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/prepa.description: Distinct class of actions or processes that make something ready for use or service.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/prepa.label: Preparation type
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/prepa.name: preparationType

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/proto._instruction: Add all protocols that were used in this protocol execution.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/proto.description: Plan that describes the process of a scientific or medical experiment, treatment, or procedure.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/proto.label: Protocol
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/proto.name: protocol

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/start._instruction: Enter the time (e.g., '20:20:39+00:00') or datetime (e.g., '2018-11-13T20:20:39+00:00') of when the activity started.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/start.label: Started at time
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/start.name: startedAtTime

https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/study._instruction: Add all study targets of this activity.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/study.description: Structure or function that was targeted within a study.
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/study.label: Study target
https://openminds.ebrains.eu/vocab/study.name: studyTarget
